x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description:
Set "change.conflict.consolidated_conflicts" system property to true for Zboot instances.
Consolidate conflicts so a conflict is only registered for each unique combination of conflict type and schedule or conflicting-change.
This will result in less conflicts but the Maintenance/Blackout schedules and conflicting changes will each be denoted as a conflict, if the property is set to false the original Change Conflict behaviour will continue.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Consolidate CHG conflicts default zboot

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_a9a3ff4483e89e50c6695855eeaad3d6

Consolidate conflicts so a conflict is only registered for each unique combination of conflict type and schedule or conflicting-change.
This will result in less conflicts but the Maintenance/Blackout schedules and conflicting changes will each be denoted as a conflict, if the property is set to false the original Change Conflict behaviour will continue.</description><name>Consolidate CHG conflicts default zboot</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script/><sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 14:54:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>a9a3ff4483e89e50c6695855eeaad3d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Consolidate CHG conflicts default zboot</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_a9a3ff4483e89e50c6695855eeaad3d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 14:54:44</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts></record_update>
